definition: third of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/third in order/letter "C" or Roman "III" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 165°/propyl

sentences.english: Modification function of phosphoric acid to low temperature carbon based on polyacrylonitrile was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了磷酸對聚丙烯腈基低溫碳材料的改性作用。

sentences.english: A below of cooling water pipes of acrylonitrile reactor bursted.
sentences.chinese: 某化工廠丙烯腈反應器冷卻水管彎管部位發生爆管。

sentences.english: Acetonitrile continuous recovery plant is a subsidiary part of acrylonitrile production unit.
sentences.chinese: 乙腈連續回收裝置是與丙烯腈生產主裝置相配套的。

sentences.english: To determine acrylonitrile content in solvent with gas chromatography.
sentences.chinese: 用氣相色譜法測定溶劑中丙烯腈的含量。

sentences.english: The polymerization of acrylonitrile in aqueous nitric acid solution with sodium nitrite as initiator has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了亞硝酸鈉引發硝酸溶液中丙烯腈的聚合反應。

sentences.english: And infrared spectrum showed that both styrene and acrylonitrile were copolymerized .
sentences.chinese: 紅外譜圖表明，苯乙烯與丙烯腈之間發生了共聚反應。

sentences.english: The PAN-based carbon fiber precursor was prepared with gel spinning method.
sentences.chinese: 利用凝膠紡絲方法制備了聚丙烯腈基碳纖維原絲。

sentences.english: The main by-product during the production of acrylonitrile is acetonitrile.
sentences.chinese: 乙腈是丙烯氨氧化制丙烯腈的主要副產物，用途很小。

sentences.english: The polymeric shell is a copolymer of a vinylidene chloride and acrylonitrile.
sentences.chinese: 該聚合體外殼是偏二氯乙烯與丙烯腈的共聚物。

sentences.english: Nitrile is a copolymer of butadiene and acrylonitrile.
sentences.chinese: 腈是一種丁二烯與丙烯腈的共聚物。

sentences.english: The stabilized polyacrylonitrile fiber was prepared by the method of liquid-phase stabilization and carbonized in nitrogen atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 通過液相穩定化法制備了聚丙烯腈穩定化纖維。

sentences.english: This paper presents a study of graft copolymerization reaction of PET fibre with acrylonitrile.
sentences.chinese: 研究了丙烯腈與滌綸纖維的接枝共聚反應。

sentences.english: Catalytic polymerization of vinyl monomers in the presence of titanocene dichloride has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了二氯二茂鈦催化丙烯腈等單體的本體聚合反應。

sentences.english: Graft reaction of acrylonitrile onto preirradiated tetrafluoroethylene- hexafluoro ethylene copolymers powder has been reported.
sentences.chinese: 報導預輻照聚全氟乙丙烯粉粒的丙烯腈接枝反應。

sentences.english: Grafting polymerization of acrylic acid onto flax initiated by ceric salt has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了利用鈰鹽引發丙烯腈與亞麻接枝共聚反應。

sentences.english: Microorganism Biodegradation of Acrylonitrile and Nitrile Hydratase;
sentences.chinese: 腈是一種丁二烯與丙烯腈的共聚物。
